youtube.title: How Your Period Actually Works: 3D Menstrual Cycle Animation
youtube.description: Understand the biology of the menstrual cycle in this clear 3D animation. We break down the monthly process of the uterine lining and ovulation to show how your body works. Perfect for students and health enthusiasts!
